me_no_target: No one can see you growl that far.
me_self: You growl at yourself.  Boy, do you feel bitter!
actor_self: $n growls at $mself.  This could get interesting...
actor_other: $n growls at $N.  Better leave the room before the fighting starts.
actor_me: $n growls at you.  Hey, two can play it that way!
